column1: At Trinity and All Saints we seek to build a multi-faith, multi-cultural learning community in which any person with the potential to benefit from higher education will find the resources and support needed to fulfill their potential.
We have a specific mission to contribute to the vocation and training of teachers.
Read what others say about our course...

column2: The overall management structure of the course is clear
column3: College tutors, staff from partnership  schools and trainees are fully involved.&quot

column2: Communications  across the partnership have some strong features. A key element is the  accessibility of college tutors who provide clarification and support to both  school-based staff and trainees. Supporting course documentation is of very  good quality.&quot

The procedures  for the assessment of trainees in schools is very clearly documented. The  process is comprehensive and straight forward and assisted by the high quality  documentation. Assessment documents are rigorously completed, constructive  feedback is provided to trainees and clear targets for development are  set.&quot
A number of  features show that the quality of training on the primary course has been  maintained or improved.&quot
